remarks: Condition for a function over the nonnegative integers to have a support contained in a finite set of sequential integers.  (Contributed by AV, 9-Oct-2019.)
statement:
suppssfz.z $e |- ( ph -> Z e. V ) $.
suppssfz.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( B ^m NN0 ) ) $.
suppssfz.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. NN0 ) $.
suppssfz.b $e |- ( ph -> A. x e. NN0 ( S < x -> ( F ` x ) = Z ) ) $.
suppssfz $p |- ( ph -> ( F supp Z ) C_ ( 0 ... S ) ) $.
$d F x $.
$d S x $.
$d Z x $.
